review: Team Fortress 2 is a fantastic game. It has many types of maps/game modes for players to play on, weapons for players to find and use, hats/miscs/cosmetics for players to equip to their mercenaries/classes. It is a game based on team work and skill, which allows the tide of a battle to change.If you don't enjoy the battling part, you can become a premium and trade with other members.
